attributes.action: Replace all income taxes with an increased VAT rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would provide a more equitable tax on spend rather than income. Advantages would be... 
(a) Exploit the existing simple VAT rules and collection methods.
(b) Easier to raise/lower taxes.
(c) Tourists and all other non-residents would contribute to the upkeep of the country.
(d) Remove inequities and tax loopholes
(e) Remove the complication of tax collection.

Disadvantages...
(a) Reduce the number of civil servants and tax lawyers (this may not be considered to be a disadvantage by most!)
(b) Increase the black market sales of goods and services.
